title: "CVC Capital to buy Japanese tutoring service Try Group for $976m"
excerpt: "CVC Capital Partners is set to acquire Try Group, a Tokyo-based online tutoring service, for about 110 billion yen ($976 million), Nikkei has learned, a move that suggests the British buyout fund sees bright prospects in the sector in Japan."
